name: Arayış
description:
The game we developed in 42 hours in the Game Marathon organized by BTK on 18 - 20 December 2018. In the given time, we were asked to develop an "educational game" with the theme of "social responsibility". In our game called "Arayış", we tell the story of a puppy being thrown into the street after being taken with money from pet shop. On scene transitions, we share real data and some information that will lead people to be sensitive.

Credits: Senem Aksakal, Volkan Sevinç, Yasin Uçar, İbrahim Çavuş
